index.footp: The Spanish word for trust, which is our main expression both internally and externally.

about.herop2: We connect people with great companies.
about.herop3: The future workplace will rely on soft skills.
about.servp: We believe that highlighting soft skills at work creates a better environment for everyone. When recruiting, we want to get to know the person behind the CV. We see the potential in the future employee.
